June 1st – 3rd 2022, Institute of New Imaging Technologies, Universitat Jaume I, Castellón (Spain)
The AGILE PhD school aims to bring PhD students from different countries together. The purpose of the school is to offer a platform for PhD students to present their research to date, exchange ideas, learn and discuss geospatial methods and acquire and improve skills related to geoinformatics. This will allow participants to:
be exposed to the diversity of fields and common features of our domain
exchange ideas about the PhD process itself
develop their own network
be exposed to the reproducibility and reproducibility practices in Geoscience and GIScience.
